title: when your in a series, give us ONE free dodge.
body: When it comes to the series, we need some way to counter trolls. i get people who are like "im high/drunk right now" in pre game chat. its fine that they are honest but seriously why are you in ranked. Some people STILL do the "i called it even though im last pick" thing, so we end up with 2 mid laners and no adc. I cant dodge cuz ill lose my series, and i cant play cuz ill lose the game. we need some type of protection.

replies.body: I play alot better when I'm drunk. (I'm a Gragas main)

I just cannot come up with any reason on why we cannot have dodges I think we should have a certain set amount of them a day. Who cares if I want to use mine because I don't like the matchup or because there's a troll on my team. Stop making me play with people I don't want to play with! This is absolutely ridiculous, I would rather go through 5 matchmaking processes that don't make it to the game then play an at least 20 minute game that I know I'm going to lose before the match even starts. This whole thing is outrageous and there is no reason this cannot be fixed.
I suggest people have to play to earn dodges, similar like earning Rerolls in ARAM.
Does this count for placements? Ahah... First game of my placements: "What's Cinderhulk?"
You already have infinite free dodge. AKA your MMR isn't affected.
the problem with that its that much people can abuse of the dodges with this. Its better may a dodge votation when this happen
